err::loader_exception

err::loader_exception Class Reference

Loader exception class. More...

#include <ILoader.hpp>

Inherits err::framework_exception.

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Loader exception class.

User which develop a new class inherrited from iloader, must use this class to throwing errors and indicate unexpected situations. Everybody use this class to catching exceptions from loaders.
